abstracts.cdata!:
The Transport Sector Project will
            finance the transport sector component of the 1991-93 public
            investment program and will be accompanied by a substantial
            number of policy measures to improve sector performance.
            These measures include: (a) deregulation of transport and
            institutional reforms for several transportation agencies;
            (b) river transport tariff reform; (c) improved transport
            sector investment planning; (d) privatization of road
            maintenance and improved domestic resource mobilization for
            road maintenance financing; and (e) a road safety program
            and improved public procurement procedures. The project
            includes the following components: (a) road sector
            component; (b) river transport component; (c) civil aviation
            component; and (d) technical assistance, training and
            special studies.
